actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1915 of title 44, United States Code, to exempt from the provisions of section 1909 of such title those libraries of the highest appellate court of a State which have been designated as depository libraries.

summary.text: Exempts libraries of the highest appellate court of a State from requirements that only a library able to provide custody and service for depository materials, located in an area where it can best serve the public need, and within an area not adequately served by existing depository libraries, may be designated as a depository of Government publications. (Amends 44 U.S.C. 1915)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1915 of title 44, United States Code, to exempt from the provisions of section 1909 of such title those libraries of the highest appellate court of a State which have been designated as depository libraries.
